WYSIWYM.transformer
Class Aggregator

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.transformer.Aggregator

public class Aggregator
extends Object

Aggregator performs syntactic aggregation within a paragraph. It orders a list of dependency trees to enable the maximum amount of ellipsis, then performs the planned aggregations. See thesis for theory and explanation (F. Hielkema (2009): Using Natural Language Generation to Provide Access to Semantic Metadata, University of Aberdeen)

Version:
1.4 2008/07/29
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

Method Detail

aggregate

public List<DependencyTreeTransformer> aggregate(List<DependencyTreeTransformer> trees)
Aggregator orders a list of dependency trees to enable the maximum amount of ellipsis, then performs the planned aggregations.

Parameters:
trees - List containing DependencyTreeTransformers to be aggregated
Returns:
List with all trees (aggregated and untouched) ordered and ready for REG.

printTree

public static void printTree(String name,
                             DependencyTree dt)
Prints the given tree to a text file with the given name.

Parameters:
name - Filename
dt - DependencyTree
